pendingSent.tooltip: Invitation sent, waiting for the user to accept it

modal.title: Remove friend
modal.content: Are you sure that you want to remove your friend {{name}}?

cancel.title: Cancelled
cancel.message: Friend request from {{login}} has been cancelled

accept.title: Accepted
accept.message: Friend request from {{login}} has been accepted

send.title: Sent
send.message: Friend request to {{login}} has been sent

remove.title: Removed
remove.message: You and {{login}} are no longer friends
